title: San Francisco/Mission
name: Bi-Rite Grocery
content: How do they get that much good produce and that incredible deli counter into that storefront?  Essential neighborhood and picnic-in-the-park resource. Dolores Park is handily enough a block away, and you're likely to find festivals, rallies, or the SF Mime Troupe at the start and close of their summer touring season there along with kids, dogs and tennis players.
